interest.col1: Besides the many challenging projects at work, I enjoy doing projects at home. Examples are creating my own home automation system and product prototyping and development. During these projects I like to develop a complete solution: from the electrical design up to the enclosure and user interface. For this I make use of many open source projects, my 3D printers, laser cutting or CNC milling.
